function: Create new to-do items with title and description fields
static_description: A form at the top of the page with a text input field for task title, a text area for task description, and a submit button. The form has a lavender background and indigo borders.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the submit button creates a new task with the provided title and description, then clears the form fields.
Pressing Enter in the title input field submits the form if both title and description are filled.

function: Edit existing to-do items including title and description
static_description: Each task item displays an edit icon. When clicked, the task transforms into an editable form with pre-filled title input and description text area, along with save and cancel buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the edit icon converts the task display into an editable form. Clicking save updates the task in the database and returns to display mode. Clicking cancel reverts changes and returns to display mode.

function: Mark to-do items as completed with visual indication
static_description: Each task displays a checkbox on the left side. Completed tasks show a checked checkbox with a strike-through title and lighter text color.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the checkbox toggles the task's completed status in the database and updates the visual styling - checked tasks show strike-through text and dimmed appearance.

function: Filter to-do items by status (all, active, completed)
static_description: Three filter buttons displayed above the task list: 'All', 'Active', and 'Completed'. Buttons are styled with indigo color scheme and lavender background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'All' shows all tasks. Clicking 'Active' shows only incomplete tasks. Clicking 'Completed' shows only finished tasks. The active filter button is visually highlighted.

function: Search to-do items by keyword across title and description
static_description: A search input field positioned above the filter buttons with a magnifying glass icon. The input field has indigo borders on a lavender background.

interaction_and_states.description: As the user types, the task list dynamically filters to show only tasks whose title or description contains the search term (case-insensitive).
Clicking the clear button (X) in the search field resets the search and displays all tasks according to the current filter setting.
